tools.name: convert_image
tools.description:
Converts a single image from one format to another.
    
    Args:
        input_path: The path to the input image file (e.g., 'images/input.jpg').
        output_path: The path where the converted image should be saved (e.g., 'images/output.png').
        output_format: The target image format (e.g., 'PNG', 'JPEG', 'BMP').
    
    Returns:
        A success message indicating the conversion was completed.
    
    Example:
        To convert an image named 'input.jpg' to 'output.png':
        convert_image(input_path='images/input.jpg', output_path='images/output.png', output_format='PNG')

tools.name: batch_convert_images_tool
tools.description:
Batch converts multiple images in a directory from their original formats to a specified format.
    
    Args:
        input_dir: Directory containing the input image files (e.g., 'input_images/').
        output_dir: Directory where the converted image files will be saved (e.g., 'converted_images/').
        output_format: The target image format for all conversions (e.g., 'PNG', 'JPEG', 'BMP').
    
    Returns:
        A summary message indicating how many images were successfully converted.
    
    Example:
        To batch convert all images in 'input_images/' to PNG format and save them in 'converted_images/':
        batch_convert_images_tool(input_dir='input_images/', output_dir='converted_images/', output_format='PNG')
